recipe.title: Halloween Buffalo Chicken Skillet Dip Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups ; chicken, cooked and shredded ; (250 g)
½ cup ; monterey jack cheese ; (50 g)
4 oz ; cheddar cheese, block of cheese, cubed ; (125 g)

steps.step: In a bowl, combine chicken, cream cheese, monterey jack, cheddar, buffalo sauce, and ranch.
On a lightly floured surface, roll out 1 tube of pizza dough. Cut out triangles for eyes, and a mouth.
Bake for 12 minutes, or until the pieces are golden brown, slightly risen and cooked through.

Cut the remaining dough into squares, place a cube of cheese on each one, and roll into balls. Repeat with the other tube of pizza dough. Place in a ring around the edges of a greased oven-safe skillet or dish.
Fill the middle of the dish with the dip filling.
Coat all of the dough with melted butter. Place the dough face pieces on the dip.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl, combine chicken, cream cheese, monterey jack, cheddar, buffalo sauce, and ranch.
On a lightly floured surface, roll out one can of pizza dough.
Cut out triangles for eyes, and a mouth.
Bake for 12 minutes, or until the pieces are golden brown, slightly risen and cooked through.
Cut the remaining dough into 16 squares, place a cube of cheese on each one, and roll into balls.
Place in a ring around the edges of a greased oven-safe skillet or dish.
Fill the middle of the dish with the dip filling.
Coat all of the dough with melted butter.
Place the dough face pieces on the dip.
